case.state: Does the fact that we share the same name make you want to play with me more, other Robin? Heh, you can call me Nico, if you prefer. It might help us avoid misunderstandings.

Nami, I don't think anyone here cares that we're pirates. It seems like a fairly normal occupation in this sort of place.
There's no point in being concerned with that, Nami. If there was anyone truly dangerous nearby they would locate us even before we mentioned who we are.

Hmmm, it appears to me that there's quite a lot of space here. Especially for someone who can fly...

No men... That's unfortunate. I'm sure this game would be more interesting if there was more variety in the players.
I wish you had invited a man to play the game, ~player~. Don't you think having both men and women at the table would make for a better game experience?
Gentlemen, let's begin. I'm sure you'll find out I'm more than enough woman for you, fufufu...
So I'm the only woman here, huh? You're way in over your head if you think that will make me cower, ~player~.
I find this place quite intriguing. The individuals that gather here seem to come from drastically diverse settings...
I have many questions about the history of this place, but I'll save them for later.
I'm sure we'll have the opportunity to maintain an amicable conversation as we play.

If this experience is enjoyable, maybe I'll convince Nami to come along next time. She stresses out too much for her own good.

None for me. Thank you.
I think I'll stick with what I have this time.
I'm satisfied with this hand. No swapping for me this round.
Nuh-uh... This won't do. Give a whole new hand.

Hmmm, no. I'll need a full new hand this time.
I'll be taking ~cards~ this time.
~Cards~, please.
Hmmm, I'm sure ~cards~ will be enough.
~Cards~... That's all I need.

Maybe ~cards~ will be enough. Well, we'll see...
~Cards~ cards and a little bit of luck is all I need.
Heheh, I like how ~cards~ sounds.
Give me ~cards~, dear dealer.
Hmmm... ~cards~. I'm gonna go with ~cards~.
~Cards~ would be just fine, please.
I'll be taking ~cards~ cards, if you don't mind.
I believed ~cards~ sounds like an appropriate number.
... ~cards~.
I require ~cards~ new cards.
And so, the excitement continues...
Mmm, I wonder who'll lose this time...
Whether you rely on luck or skill, I wish you the best this round.
Oh... I wasn't trying particularly hard in this opportunity.
I'm curious to see how you'll react to this...
Hmmmm... Seems like it's not time yet.
Curious... This isn't exactly what I was going for.
I see... If I told you I have a good hand, would you try harder, or would you give up? Remember there's always a chance in this game...
Have you thought about how many games would be better played naked? Heheh...

It seems bluffing wouldn't offer more than a minor advantage in this version of Poker. That means there's no reason not to relax and enjoy ourselves.
It's all coming back to me... The rules of Poker. It didn't take long, seeing as how it's a fairly simple game.
This is without a doubt a very forgiving game.
I'm interested to see the reward for winning this round.
Before spending time attempting to read our faces remember that it's pointless.
How lovely...

I see... Are you ready?
I wouldn't consider it appropriate to gloat for having good luck, so I won't say anything.
Heh, what are the odds?
No point in delaying this any longer, is there?

Huh... This is interesting. I'll have to remember what I did this time.
Yes...
Don't worry if your cards don't meet my expectations. That's not what this game is about.

Try to avoid making any mistakes you might regret. For your own good.
I would like to examine this place thoroughly, but finishing the game is my first priority.
Just as I thought... Are you ready?
Isn't this game a little too forgiving at times?
While I have no issue lying, I prefer to do it for important reasons, not while playing games.
Fascinating. It's always a great feeling when taking a high risk is rewarded.
I advice that you think your next move carefully.
Even if I'm not ashamed, I'm not used to being exposed outside. The feeling of the wind on my skin is quite pleasant... All of my skin.
The air outside is quite pleasant to~background.time~, isn't it? This being the first time I've exposed my body outdoors makes this quite a refreshing experience.
This is a lovely lodge. I wouldn't mind spending some more time here after the game, given how cozy it is.
I'm sure my crew would love spending some time in this lodge. Chopper would play around near the tree, while Sanji bakes cookies in the kitchen... It'd still be difficult keeping some of them inside.
There are enough weapons here to arm a small army. But who are they fighting, and for what reason? I'd like to find out the answers before I leave.

I don't recognize that banner... The weapons here are not very modern, yet they seem to have been made recently... And what could be in those books? So many questions I hope to find the answer to later.
If you look out the window you can tell that this city has no issues building tall buildings like this one. That must mean they're not at constant risk of being under attack. That's good.
This city has progressed quite a lot. There's no doubt if they're able to build tall buildings such as this one for the sole purpose of containing these offices.
Hmmm... Upon closer examination, these weapons don't appear to have ever been used. This appears to be a decorative armory room. But for what purpose?
Whoever is in charge of cleaning up this room has done a perfect job. There isn't even a single blood stain on these weapons. Either that, or they've never been used.
I appreciate the consideration of not staring at my nudity directly, but I assure you it's not necessary. After all I've lost fair and square.
I can't say I understand the sentiment of trying to win at any cost. This game is meant to be solely for fun, isn't it?
My, my...
Being on the brink of defeat always makes things much more... exhilarating.
Heh... I'm truly having much more fun than I expected to get out of this game.
I'm glad that this game has allowed us to talk to each other as we play. Many other games can be distracting.

Oh...

I see...

If any of you needs more time to think, let me know.

I'm looking forward to seeing what you have. You seem very focused, so I'm sure it's good.
Do you find it interesting that the cards are being dealt by a...? Never mind, we can talk about that later.

I don't mind standing here in my panties while you make your choice. Just stay focused.
Heheh... There's something funny about this hand, but it would take too long to explain it.

Hmm, as expected.

I'm done on my side, but take your time.
If you want to know what I have, you'll have to rely on your instinct this time.
I believe it's more interesting when the outcome can go either way.

If there's one person here I want to learn more about, I'd say it's ~nonhuman~. I can't stop imagining what new information I can learn...

~Weapon_opponent~~, if you insist on pointing that weapon at the other players I'll have no choice but to disarm you. Speed is useless against me, so it would only take an instant.

state.text: You clearly like taking photos, ~camera~. However, I'll have to ask you to be discreet while photographing me, for your own good. There are dangerous people who would like to know my whereabouts.
~Camera~, if you don't mind I'll have to ask you to avoid taking my picture. I don't want to alarm you, but there are people that would harm you to get any photos you take of me.

~Camera~, if you take any pictures of me, I'll have to ask you to delete them later. I don't mean to alarm you but there are very bad people that would do anything to get any information on me, including hurting others.
~Camera~, you can take my picture with your camera if you want. However, I'll have to ask you to delete the photos afterwards. It's for your own sake.

case.state: This alley seems like the sort of place where some horrible crime took place. An interesting location, but probably not the most appropriate one for this sort of game.

It's fortunate that it's not cold inside this lodge. If we were playing outside we'd possibly die from hypothermia the sooner we lose. That wouldn't be a very fun game.

state.text: Don't sell yourself short, Nami. You're not bad. I'm sure you'll only get better after you have more practice with our mutual friend here, fufufu.
I hope you're not jealous, ~player~. Nami is my friend, and she only has eyes for you... Unless, of course, you were into it.

case.state: Don't feel bad, Nami, you tried your best. I suppose I'm not a very ticklish person. But I'll give you some advice: next time you should try my thighs.
I see... Isn't she also the woman that was living with Zoro and Dracule Mihawk during our training? It's quite a coincidence meeting her here.
I haven't met her in person, but her voice surely sounds familiar. It seems it's the same one her ghosts have.

state.text: This is the kind of day in which a woman likes to feel young and attractive, Nami. I think this is the perfect way to spend a birthday, if you ask me.

You're a good girl, Perona. I'm pleased that I got to witness a young woman like yourself experience her first orgasm. It was delightful.

Even if you don't like women, I hope you won't regret inviting me here, ~player~. I only have a handful of female friends.

Nami, I have an idea. Since you're clearly so convinced that you're not going to lose this, how about we make a wager? If I get naked, I have to do whatever you tell me to. if you get naked, you do the same. I'll be sure to make it fun.
Would you care to make this game more interesting, Nami? How about if one of us has to get naked, they have to do one thing the other one tells them. Anything.

state.text: Nami... If you ever want to have some alone time outside of the bath, you could sit on a towel. You've probably thought about it before, but you didn't want me to notice, did you?
Hello.
Good introduction, Nami. Very concise.
I'm sure you'll have more questions after that introduction, so feel free to ask whatever's on your mind.
Exactly what Nami said. It's nice to meet you.
That's right, we didn't introduce ourselves at the beginning.
I see, so your society considers women in their twenties to be at the peak of their life... If I had a baby I'd rather not neglect them, and my current goal keeps me too busy at the moment.

Mmmm, you certainly shouldn't let your hair grow much longer. I have a feeling some of your appeal would be lost, Nami.

case.state: I like how your hair looks right now, but if you want I can give you haircut later.
I told you before, Nami. You have perfect hair, so it's fine if you want to let it grow longer. But if you'd rather get a haircut I'll help you with that later.

state.text: That's a nice topic of conversation. I'll share my own: My dream is to uncover the true history of the world, especifically what happened during the Void Century.
I'm also interested in hearing if you have any dreams. Nami already knows my own, which is to learn the true history of the world, and the Void Century.
I might as well share my dream, even if you already know it, Nami. I want to find the Rio Poneglyph which contains the true history of the world, and the events of the Void Century.
Good idea, Nami. Even hearing the name of a dangerous place would be helpful, so we don't mention it near Luffy.
Do you ever think maybe we've already visited the most dangerous places in the world, Nami? I doubt that's the case, but we might have a record.
That question might be useful, Nami, but I believe the most dangerous places are the ones nobody can tell you about, because there were no survivors to tell the story.
That's quite the appropriate question for this situation, Nami. I must've told you at one point, but my favorite part of my body are my legs.
Fufufu, I'm sure someone will appreciate that question, Nami. If I had to choose only one part of my body, it'd be my legs.
I'm not surprised that's your preference, Nami. You have every reason to feel that way. For me, it's my legs.
It was clear to me how your ability works once I saw Luffy, Franky and Zoro get affected by it, but it's good to get a proper explanation.
I wonder if the emotional damage that these ghosts inflict accumulates, or if it merely caps at a certain limit. If it's the former you could give people chronic depression.
My answer to this question is simple: Chopper is the cutest. Seeing him happy is enough to warm my heart everytime.
I've never met anyone cuter than Chopper. He awakens my motherly instincts just by being close to me. I want nothing more than to see him smile.
I'd say being a living, breathing being is a significant factor when considering cuteness, wouldn't you? How alive would you say that doll of yours is?
I'm very much in disagreement. I won't stay silent if you speak ill of Chopper and how adorable he is. For your information he's a reindeer, not a raccoon. Also, unlike your doll, he's alive.
I'm not starting this debate all over again. Let's simply agree to disagree.
It seems clear to me that we have irreconcilable differences in opinion. We should accept that, before this discussion gets ugly.
You must be quite desperate if you're making those sort of comments, Nami. I've never seen your seductive remarks get that direct.
Nami... I understand you want to win this game, but you shouldn't make remarks like that to strangers. I might not always be nearby to protect you, and not everybody is as harmless as ~player~.
Indeed. I've never met anyone like Luffy. His resolve and the willpower he displays to accomplish his goals and protect those dear to him is nothing short of superhuman.
Heheh, you just had to mention Zoro's lacking sense of direction, didn't you? He's also an incredibly honorable man who'll never compromise on his ideals.
Usopp has certainly come a long way. He's not only far braver now, but also significantly stronger. And no matter how many hardships he faces, I know I can rely on him.
Not to mention that Sanji is one of the strongest members of our crew, even if he's physically unable to hurt women. I respect that stands by his ideals.

Fufufu... I can picture Chopper blushing while hearing you talk about him like that. But it's truly impressive what a great doctor he is, despite being so young. And I don't think you emphasized just how cute he is, Nami.
I can't disagree. It's true that a lot of times I don't understand Franky's antics, but he's still a wonderful man underneath all his metal enhancements.
Brook's silliness is completely harmless. He can always be relied upon, no matter the situation. And considering what he's been through, it's a miracle he didn't grow bitter.
It's been great finally having Jinbei join our crew. I'm not saying I don't enjoy the antics of our more frenzied crew mates, but I welcome having a more mature presence around.
Heheheh... I like how motivated you're feeling, Nami.
Ah, isn't she cute when she gets all competitive, ~player~?
I'm sure ~player~ doesn't mind. I was very happy when Nami told me, because I could see how happy she was. And I appreciate learning about her taking another step towards becoming a woman.
Heheh, you truly shouldn't mind, ~player~. If it makes you feel better, she was very impressed with your performance. Granted, she doesn't have a lot to compare to, but it still counts for something.
I don't think I was doing a very good job keeping the "secret" myself, heheh. But now it doesn't matter anymore.
Bounty hunters have never been much of an issue for us, have they? It doesn't matter here what bounties we have on our heads.
I'd very curious to learn if there are any undercover members of the Marines or the Government that are sent to games such as this one.
I'd be quite interested in hearing what you have to say. I'm not fascinated by gossip, but I'll accept any new information regardless of how it's provided.
I'll gladly donate. There are few causes I'd rather put my money on. You don't have to look so sad... Still, you're quite adorable when you pout like that, fufu...
I've dabbled into assassination in the past. When it comes naturally to you, and you're willing to do whatever it takes to survive, it's not much of a dilemma.
I can relate. I also feel my maternal instinct overcoming me when I see a cute kid. I certainly would love becoming a mother, or at the very least an aunt.
It's even easier than you think to acquire a Devil Fruit's powers, Cynthia. You only need to take of one bite. However, there's only one type of each fruit in the world.
It would be my pleasure to accompany you, Cynthia. If you don't mind, I would just need to pick up my bag first and I would be ready to go with you.
I have several historical facts I could share, but I would have a hard time determining whether they're "juicy". Sometimes people don't share my same interest for historical data.
On that note, have you ever heard of the name "Joyboy", Cynthia? Most likely not... It's a shot in the dark, but I thought I'd ask anyway.
I believe the most historical moment that had the most impact in my modern world was the establishment of the World Government, 800 years ago. But that's more a fact than an opinion, I must say.

I once read a theory that life was created as an accident when ancient gods where trying to create a permanent supply of booze. It's rumored that the professor who presented that theory used to partake in certain herbs, which makes more sense.

Once I came across an ancient sexual toy for Devil Fruit users. It used a small amount of Sea Prism stone, which normally weakens Devil Fruit users, as stimulation. I can't say it was poorly designed...

There's a small country in the South Blue that was ruled by a tyrant. After he was overthrown, he was placed naked in the center of the capital, and every citizen was allowed to spank him. Once everybody had their share, he was decapitated.
I love hearing you talk about our friends, Nami. But now I have to wonder: What would you say about me? If I wasn't here right now.
It warms my heart listening to you talk about our friends like that, Nami. I wish I could hear what you'd say about me, if I wasn't here to~background.time~.

Nami, you're so humble talking about our friends but not yourself. I can say that Nami is the most amazing navigator I've met. She cares deeply for every single one of her friends, even if she shows it in peculiar ways.

Nami, since you chose to only talk about our friends, I will talk about you. Nami is the best navigator in the world. The only thing she cares about more than maps and treasure are her friends. She's one of the most caring people I've met.
I'm always willing to hear about the travels of those who have visited many different places. I'd be honored if you'd join me sometime, ~adventurer~.
If you have an afternoon free, I'd love to hear about your adventures, ~adventurer~. You never know what you learn from other people's travels.
I'm very curious to know what kind of places you've visited, ~adventurer~. Maybe you can tell sometime, perhaps over a cup of coffee.
I'd love to gather with this same group another time, and spend an afternoon having a stimulating conversation without this game getting in the way.
While this is a lovely table, I would be interested in gathering with this same group at a different time and partaking in some intellectual stimulation, as opposed to this other type.
There are certain ancient tribes in the world that pierce parts of their bodies as custom... Although in much stranger places than the nipples, usually.
~Pierced~, I take it you got those piercings of your own accord, and not due to religious beliefs or tribal affiliations.

case.state: You can call me Robin. I'm an archeologist. I'm interested in getting to know you more as we play.
My name is Robin. Nice to meet you. I'm sure we can have fun playing this game, while we get to know each other little by little.
I'm Robin, by the way. It's a pleasure to meet you.
How rude of me not introducing myself earlier... You can call me Robin. I hope we can have a good time.
Oh, forgive me... I haven't introduced myself properly yet. My name is Robin. Let's make this a fun game for everyone.

state.text: Taking a look at this table, it seems clear that we're from drastically different places. I'm curious to know what you can tell me about your place of origin... Its culture, history, or just whatever comes to mind.

While the purpose of this game is to have fun, that doesn't mean we can't learn from each other. For instance, I'd like to know what you can tell me about the place you come from. Anything about its culture would be interesting to hear.
I would love to hear about the places you come from. I take it they're very different from mine, with their own history and culture. Anything you can tell me would be helpful.

case.state: This has been a fairly long game... That's good. This wouldn't be an interesting game if there was no competition.
Are you tired yet? This game has been going for a while. Perhaps I should start getting serious.
Is it just my idea, or has this game become even easier in these recent rounds?
It must be frustrating for you that I'm so close to losing, yet I keep winning...
Hmmm, I suppose winning continuously is not necessarily fun in this game.
I very much doubt you're pleased with my nonstop winning streak. That's not why you invited me after all, isn't it, ~player~?
Perhaps there should be a way of making this game more difficult. I doubt I'm the only one that enjoys a challenge.
I came here expecting this game to pose more of a challenge.
Just you and me now, huh? Should I go all out? No, just may the best one win.
My, I made it to the end... What do you think? Should I let you win, or should I try my best? I wonder...

state.text: Very subtle, Nami. Heheh...
I don't think you're giving ~player~ enough credit, Nami.
I do agree that ~player~ is very cute.
What do you say, ~player~? Would it change your mind if there's one more woman here who wants to see that?
I'm sure it'll be a kiss on the cheek at most, but she purposefully omitted that part.
You're going to count blowing a kiss, aren't you Nami?
That's not a bad strategy, keeping things vague.
Not bad, Nami. Not bad.
I'm sure someone will be naked soon.
Isn't that the entire point of the game, Nami?
But only a look, I take it...
That... might actually work.

case.state: I should probably warn you... Do not be alarmed if you see any limbs sprouting nearby. It's simply my Flower Flower ability.
In case anybody here has a heart condition, I should let you know that this is my ability, the power of the Flower Flower fruit. I'll most likely be using it from time to time.
It's common courtesy to tell you about my ability, isn't it? This is the power of the Flower Flower fruit. It allows me to replicate parts of my body on any surface.

state.text: Are you still tired, ~player~? Heheh... I'd like to hold you in my arms and caress your hair...
You've certainly earned a good rest, ~player~. I want you to know how much I appreciate you behaving so well during your performance.
If you're feeling thirsty you should go get some water, ~player~. It's alright, we can wait for you.
~Player~, I hope you don't feel overcome with negative emotions after you've finished pleasuring yourself. This is a completely natural and beautiful thing, you know?

case.state: Personally, I would've preferred to play a game with more people. But this should still be enjoyable.
Any reason why you only chose two players for this game, ~player~? Perhaps you're shy, heheh...

state.text: I realize that I explained my ability, but not how I got it. I obtained it from eating a Devil Fruit. They're mysterious fruits that grant special abilities at the cost of being unable to swim for the rest of your life.
My apologies, I realize now that most likely you've never heard of Devil Fruits. They're rare fruits that grant special abilities to those that eat them. That's how I acquired mine.
You've never heard about Devil Fruits before, have you? They're fruits that grant abilities to those that eat them. That's how I obtained the ability I showed you earlier.

case.state: If nobody mind, I'd like to take a look at the books they have here later.
I'm interested in seeing what kind of books they have in this library... but later. The game comes first.
~Cheater~, just because some of us have easier ways of winning this game, that doesn't mean we have to use them.
~Cheater~, wouldn't you rather enjoy the game and have fun regardless of the outcome than looking for unethical ways to win?
Congratulations, Nami... Ask me anything. No point in holding back.
Well, a bet is a bet. Feel free to ask me any question, Nami. Don't make it an easy one.
I suppose it was my idea, wasn't it? Very well, lay it on me, Nami.
I see the irony, since I came up with the idea. Okay, what's your command, Nami?
Hmmm, you see...
If I had to say, it'd be...
Heheh, I must've missed that. Did you find out what was in the bottle after?
Hmmm, do you think you hit him too hard sometimes? The other day he was talking weird, with slurred speech. I'm worried all your punches might be causing him brain damage.
Do you mean when he caused the soda explosion, or when he threw our laundry in the water?
That's unfortunate. Did you go see Chopper so he could help you with your hand?
Maybe I'm out of practice with card games. That's unfortunate... or it might make the game more exciting.
It has been a long time since I've played Poker. It should take me a minute or two to refresh my memory.
I'm glad to see you're having fun, Nami.
It didn't take you very long to get into the spirit of the game, Nami.
It wouldn't feel right to win this game without losing a few times, Nami. That's the point of it.
I can't say you're wrong, but now I'm curious to know what led you to that conclusion.
Is it so obvious? Or maybe you just know me that well by now, fufufu... I suppose I'll remove my skirt, even though I really like it. Koala picked this skirt for me.
Did you think I was gonna remove my skirt, or is that what you want, Nami? Either way, I'll oblige.
Well, it was always possible that it would come to this. I already accepted that from the beginning.
I wasn't counting on the game reaching this point, but it's certainly not outside of the realm of possibilities.
I could choose to be upset over this development, or I could accept that it only makes the game more thrilling when it's challenging. In every possible way.
You don't need to protect me, Nami. There's not much they could say that would offend me.
I could've played while sacrificing some sportsmanship, if you know what I mean. But that wouldn't be very fun now, would it?
It's okay, Nami. I would've never been on board with us playing this game if I thought there was a chance of you being uncomfortable.
Yes, Nami. I lost.
I'm delighted that you're enjoying this, Nami.
No, I'm here simply to have a good time. My crew isn't with me.
If you must know, I came here by myself. My only objective to~background.time~ is to enjoy the game.
Hmmm, I'm afraid not. Rather, I didn't have any expectations whatsoever.
I can't say that I ever thought about you. Not at all.
I stand by what I said. However, I didn't anticipate that'd be enough to make you cry. For that I apologize.
I apologize if my tone was too harsh. You cry very easily. Still, I was being completely honest.
That's right. You've met Nami, haven't you?
Nami didn't come with me. You two have met, right?
Weird? Not at all. But it is somewhat disappointing that ~player~ has already seen me naked. That surely must take some of the excitement away from this game.
It's not weird for me, at the very least. But I'm worried ~player~ is disappointed to be playing with me after he already saw me naked. It's unfortunate for me too.
Heh... You have a bit of a sadistic tendency, Perona. That's interesting...
Will I? I truly don't know. I suppose we'll find out.
Is that your impression? I don't mind people looking. That's what I took my clothes off for, after all.
It wouldn't be fair to cover myself. I'm sure someone would find it disappointing to see me lose only to not be able to see my body clearly.
I'm sure you're right, but I have no problem with that. If a man can't even muster up the courage to talk to me, odds are I would have no interest in him.
I like men who can display at least a minimum amount of courage. If the sight of a taller woman is enough to intimidate them, then they don't matter to me at all.
Do you wish to be taller? If you're still young then it's possible you might still grow a little more, as long as you're well fed.
You're certainly not short and you have good posture, but you might grow a bit taller still. Just make sure to eat properly.
I study a bit of everything, but my main area of interest is the hidden history of 800 years ago surrounding the Void Century.
Heh, the history I have a particular interest in isn't as ancient, but perhaps just as unknown. I want to learn about the Void Century from 800 years ago.
I wouldn't say every crew needs an archeologist aboard. However, there's plenty about my world that is unknown. Any bit of information can make the difference between life and certain death.
In my experience it's not traditional for a pirate crew to include an archeologist. But information is of the essence in a world as big as mine, so I like to think it makes a difference.
Apologies. Perhaps you're simply mistaking my patience for indifference. You could say I'm used to dealing with children of all ages, after all.
I know what you're saying. Perhaps it's due to me being surrounded by several people with childish tendencies, but I assure you that I always take them seriously when the situation demands it.
I've had this ability since I was a child. It took some time to accept that I'm different from other people, but I've had a lot of time to come to terms with it.
I was very young when I acquired this ability. It was harsh as a young girl to come to terms with the fact that it doesn't make me a monster. Now I see it simply as a part of me.

I would be delighted, Y'shtola. It's been a long time since I've had a chance to participate in an intellectual conversation. However, I think I must warn you that my interests include sensitive information that can be dangerous to know.

It would be my pleasure to have a discussion with a fellow scholar. But it would be reckless of me to share my findings without warning you that very powerful people don't want them to be public knowledge.
My, I'm certainly not a model, heheh. But it's quite flattering to be mistaken for one. I'm a pirate, in fact. And an archeologist.
A model? Heh, I'm afraid not. But I appreciate the compliment. I assume I don't quite look like most pirates or archeologists.
Certainly. For people that constantly travel around the world any piece information can prove invaluable. You can never underestimate the importance of history.
I wholeheartedly agree, Fina. You can never dismiss any piece of historical information as useless. Anything can make the difference between life and death.
Outnumbered? My, don't tell me you're scared? I believe Pit is feeling a bit intimidated by us, Nami.
Heh, I get it. If you have trouble making eye-contact, you can look anywhere you want. I don't mind.
This is nothing new for me. If you don't want to look up at my eyes, then simply look where you feel comfortable. It's not an inconvenience for me.
It would be quite ditzy of me not to notice. I don't see the need to wear a bra with this jacket. Is that so unusual?
Of course. A bra is only meant to support the breasts, so I don't see the point in wearing one when this jacket already offers enough support.
I could grow an extra head, but unfortunately I wouldn't be able to regrow this one if I lost it, as I would be dead. This is of course my theory, and I haven't tested it yet.
Regretfully, if I was decapitated I would die, and therefore I'd be unable to use my ability anymore. This would be different from growing an extra head, which I could do.
While I do spend a lot of time reading, I quite enjoy going out into the field. But that isn't to say I enjoy being on the spotlight. That's how I've lived most of my life.
I'm quite aware that I'm traditionally attractive, but I find it much more comfortable to not be the center of attention. It's a natural instinct that I've cultivated since I was young.
My, you're quite insecure, aren't you? There's more to attractiveness than good looks, in my opinion. I consider intelligence to be quite alluring in others.
I don't see why a girl like you should be envious of me. Besides, appearance isn't everything. I'd consider them secondary to confidence and intelligence.

There was a century of history in my world of which there are no records, except for these stones called Poneglyphs, and I'm one of the only people who can read them. The government doesn't want that information to be known.

800 years ago, there was a void century of history except for what's written in these stones called Poneglyphs. Only I can read them, which made me a target of the World Government, that doesn't want that knowledge to become public.
That's right. Nami is my friend and crew mate, and Ghost girl is... I suppose she's a former enemy. I'm not entirely sure what she is to us now.
Hmmm... What a sorry display this has been for me.
Unbelievable...
Heeheeh... I'm losing quite a lot, aren't I? What am I going to do...?
Apologies. Clearly I'm a bit rusty.
Oh, it's impressive that you managed to make me lose with this hand. That's not easy task. You clearly know what you're doing.
Huh, I wasn't expecting to lose this time. Consider me impressed.
Heheh, I haven't even said my name and I already have to undress. My name is Robin, nice to meet you.
You're not playing around, huh? Making me lose even before I have introduced myself. You can call me Robin.
I see... This game might be more interesting than I expected if I'm losing the first round. But I like a challenge.
Heeheeh... I don't consider it funny that I'm the first one to lose. In fact I'm relieved that this might be more difficult than I anticipated.
Heh, "It's about time she lost"... Is that what you're thinking? Oh well...
Alright, then... This wouldn't be very interesting if I go even longer without losing, don't you agree?
It's finally my turn, huh? Not a problem. I'm sure this will be more fun for everyone.
I see... Looks like you're not here just to play around.
Would you look at that? I lost. There's always a first time for everything, isn't there?
Alright, it's my turn now. Let's see if I understood this correctly...
Oh, it's my turn... Fair enough.
Hmmm... Yes, this checks out. I lose this round.
Makes sense. I could've done better this time.
Heheh, it's my loss.
Oh my, I lost again. As you can see I'm not wearing a lot, so this is quite a predicament.
Hmmm, if this continues I'll be backed into a corner. Interesting...
A game without risks is no fun, so you can understand how excited I am that things have gotten to this point.
You might think I'd play better the more I lose, but there's only so much I can do in this game with skill alone.
Hmmm...
I see... So it's finally time to expose my body. How are you feeling? Are you intrigued?
It would've been a disappointment to go through this game without some actual stripping.
Hmmm... Now for the first time I'm faced with an important decision.
I should congratulate you. By now it's clear that you're quite good at this game.
My... In the end I have to get fully nude in this strip poker game. Not quite an unexpected turn of events.
So I ended up losing all my clothes. This shouldn't surprise me, given the nature of the game, but I did try to avoid this outcome... within reason.
Hmmm... Perhaps this should bother me, but I'm partially intrigued to hear what you have to say about my naked body.
Ah... This means you won't be leaving here with any questions about what my body looks like. Good for you.
Makes sense that a pair wouldn't be enough to win. Statistically, it's the second most common hand.
Uh-huh, I only had a pair this time. Did you know that on a standard deck there's a 42% chance to get exactly a pair? Of course, that chance increases with swapping by...
Enough...!
That's enough! Both of you!
I'm positive accessories are considered fair game in strip poker games. This one shouldn't be any different.
Accessories usually count as items one can remove in this game. Otherwise they wouldn't last very long, would they?
Are you asking me if I've played Strip Poker before? Does that seem like something I'd enjoy, Nami?
Do you mean Strip Poker, Nami? Is that what you think I used to do with my free time? My, my...

"History of the Shishino Kingdom". It's a very interesting read, being the only recollection of the history of that kingdom that doesn't skip over the rebellion of... Well, we can talk about it later.
"A Long War". It's a very comprehensive history of the origins of the war between the Longarm Tribe and the Longleg Tribe 1000 years ago. It still skips over some details though.
That was this exact same pair. He asked me to lend them to him. Something about wanting to look "manly and cool".
It was this very same pair that I lent to him. If I remember correctly he mentioned something about trying to look more manly, like Franky.
Nami, are you... jealous? That's very unlike you. I don't think I've mentioned Koala at all recently.
Is that so? I can't even remember the last time I mentioned Koala to you. Don't tell me you're jealous of her, Nami?
That's true... Do you think I should get a tattoo, or something?
I can say the same about you. Maybe I should get a tattoo. What do you think?
Mmm...? What for?
What are you thanking me for?
I don't think that's true... Having food on my face after eating would be quite embarrassing, for example.
There are certainly some situations that would make me feel embarrassed, such as if I spilled my coffee on my clothes...
That's amusing. Did you think I'd changed so much during the two years we didn't see each other that I'd developed a taste for not wearing underwear?
Heh, how curious. I never thought my skirt would give people that idea. You must've thought I'd found some new interests since we last saw each other.
My, it would be quite a predicament if my clones were fully nude. Especially considering I use them to fight in very close quarters.
If my clones were fully nude that would certainly complicate things, don't you think?
Hmmm, that reminds me of when I wore your clothes. Remember, Nami? Back when I first got on the ship and I didn't have my own set of clothes.
Heh, do you remember when I first joined the crew and I wore your clothes until I was able to buy my own? They were the only women's clothes around, after all.
Are you saying you want to try new naked experiences, Nami? I've read of certain nudist beaches in the Grand Line, in case you'd want to go to one together.
Don't tell me you're getting curious about where else we can be naked, Nami. Maybe you'd like to try sunbathing on the deck of the Sunny without wearing a swimsuit next time.
I didn't know that. Perhaps it would be unusual for some people to see dismembered limbs everywhere when they're not used to it. But you're not scared of me now, are you?
I wasn't aware that you felt that way about my ability. You could've told me, but I suppose I wasn't as easily approachable back then.
It's not that I didn't think it was annoying, but Chopper looked so excited to see what Franky was building that I didn't want to interrupt. What was he making in the end?
I considered saying something, but Chopper was jumping with excitement in a way he only does when he looks forward to Franky's inventions. But I'm afraid I didn't see what he was building in the end.
Seriously? That's your question? That sounds like something a schoolgirl would ask her friend in a sleepover.
Is that really your question? I was expecting something a little more adult. That's something a teenage girl would ask her friend to tease her.
My favorite sex position? It's reverse cowgirl.
That's an easy question. It's reverse cowgirl.
That's interesting. I don't believe anyone forced you to come here, am I wrong?
Didn't you come here out of your own volition too? I don't see why your situation would be any different to mine.

I wouldn't say I know you, but I get what kind of person you are. You make fun of others to feel better about yourself, you put up an aura of self-importance even though you're very insecure and lonely... Should I keep going?

I think I understand what you're like. You're a very lonely person, yet you're too insecure to admit it, so you act as if you were doing a favor to others by being in their presence. Is that accurate?
I know what is like to feel lonely. But if you antagonize people, all you're gonna do is perpetuate that. There's nothing stopping you from being honest.
I also felt lonely for a long time, and all I did was distrust others. Most times it was with good reason, but if you aren't willing to give people a chance, then you'll be alone forever.
Hmmm, that does sound like her.
I see...
I wouldn't say that. The best part of this game is the anticipation. You must've felt some of that the first you played with ~player~, right?
I can't say I agree. Do you remember what it felt like your first time playing with ~player~, Nami? Did you feel something when he was looking at you take off your clothes?
Well, that's easy to answer, but I'm not sure you'll like it... I fantasize about you and ~player~ having sex while I watch.
That's it...? Alright, let me remove this first...
Heh, very well... If that's what you want to try, come over here. But I assure you, it won't be any different from how it always goes.
I believe I explained this already. Perhaps you were spacing out at the time.
No, this is my ability. I explained it earlier. I appreciate your concern regardless.
Oh? I wasn't aware that not wearing a bra is so special. Why is that, Perona?
Does it now? Please, Perona. Explain to us why it makes sense for me not to wear a bra.
You could say that. I used to stop at nothing for the sake of my research. I even joined several criminal organizations if it meant I'd get closer to my goal.

I have no interest in stealing from innocent people. I suppose there could be a scenario in which I'd like to reclaim a historical artifact if it was in the wrong hands, but I'd like to avoid violence if possible.

Do you perhaps wish to be taller for the sake of your girlfriend? While I might seem tall to you, where I'm from there are people who are twice as tall as both of us, and they're not even considered giants. Basically, it's all about perspective.

Have you by any chance heard of a rack? It was commonly used as a torture device, but in some cases it was also utilized as a device to grow taller. There's no evidence that it works, but if you're desperate...
It's the same everywhere. My entire life I've fought against people that want to keep destroy the past. The damage they've done to history is far worse than the passing of time.
I'm not surprised. What few records there are of the past have often been hidden, manipulated or destroyed. The true enemy of history is not time, but people.

I don't think age is the most important fact. I'm not the oldest one in my crew, and some of my elders often join the silliness. Even I find myself wanting to feel like a kid again sometimes. What about you?
Age doesn't always equal maturity. One of my crew mates is over 80 years old, yet he behaves like a child most of the time. But I can relate to that feeling of recovering your childhood, don't you?

The fact that I grew up without my mother around, and I spent most time alone didn't help. I don't think most kids know how their actions have consequences. Still, while I didn't have a happy childhood I'm not bitter about those times.

Kids do not partake in bullying out of rationality. Whether they did it because they saw me as a pariah, or if that was a consequence of their teasing is a mystery. Regardless, I don't resent those times.
Who would put a joke inside a bottle and throw it in the sea? It's possible that it contained a hidden message. Do you still have it?
Hmm, that has picked my curiosity. Do you remember what the joke was, Nami?
Hmm, would you've felt bad for punching Luffy if it turned out to be a treasure map?
Maybe it's for the best that it got lost. Even if it was something significant, like a letter, there's no guarantee that it would lead us to anything good.
That's true. Making Luffy go to bed without eating would be akin to slaughtering a pig in front of other pigs.
I have no doubt that would be a worse punishment. Not only that, but we can't risk having our captain spend most of the time with low energy and barely moving.
It was the two days ago, after dinner. He was talking strange and not pronouncing his words properly all night. I could barely understand what he was saying.
Don worry about it, I'm sure it was nothing serious. It's sweet to see how you care about him when things get serious, despite how violent your interactions with him get sometimes.
Don't worry about it, I took care of it. I saw the basket full of clothes falling over board and I managed to grab it in time.
It wasn't as serious as it sounds. He knocked over the basket full of clothes, but I was able to grab it before it fell in the water.
That's right. Our poor doctor is the one who truly suffers. Luffy, on the other hand, is up and running around again not five minutes after you beat him.
In that case maybe you could give Luffy an easier time next time so Chopper has less work. It's still a mystery to me how you can even damage Luffy, but at least it doesn't seem to stick.

Of course, I often ponder what swimming must feel like. As I've had my Devil Fruit since I was a child, it's not something I ever remember doing. But every fiber of my being reminds me that I'd drown if I tried.

I do indeed wonder what it must be like to swim. If I ate my Devil Fruit at a later age I might've tried it once, but that wasn't the case. However, I'd have to overcome my survival instinct that warns me not to go in the water.
Isn't it better to take things slowly? The anticipation of what's to come is always the best part...
If I'm to take this game seriously... I might as well go one step at a time.
It's always better to leave the best for last, so my first choice is an obvious one.
Obviously I'm going to start with the smallest item I'm wearing, as any reasonable person would.
Right, I'll remove my shoes for now. I prefer to feel taller, but it has to be done.
Of course, I must remove my shoes first. It's simply the most logical decision right now.
I wouldn't have a problem exposing my body now, but I prefer doing this in order.
Isn't it better to save the best for last? That's what I prefer.
Time to make this a little more interesting... This is the point of the game, after all.
I'm feeling more generous this time, so I'll take off my skirt.
If you were disappointed the last time I lost, perhaps this will satisfy you...
I wouldn't want you to think I'm not taking this game seriously. Therefore, this is my choice...
I've never considered the fact that I don't need to move in order to undress as a perk of my ability, but it does come in handy.
There's no part of my body I'm self-conscious about, so I'm neutral about this choice... I'll just go with my panties first.
In the spirit of keeping things interesting, I'll go with the unexpected choice and remove my panties first.
These panties are quite small, aren't they? I might as well remove them first.
There's no point in wearing a bra with this jacket. It offers a good amount of support by itself.

Certainly, no book could ever do justice to several of the places I've seen in my travels. Their image is forever imprinted in my mind. Do you feel that way too?

If I had to name one thing, it'd be gathering all the pieces to a mystery and then solving it. Even solving a simple puzzle can give me that feeling, but it doesn't compare to unearthing the secrets of an ancient civilization.
I love nothing more than the feeling you get from uncovering the secrets of the world's history. It's not unlike the feeling you could get from solving a small puzzle, yet much, much richer...

What I'm concerned with is what you consider beauty, rather than you caring about the concept at all. For instance, I've read of an island of only women in which their notion of beauty is associated to strength.
